Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1xqYINC"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/02a10f67509629d20778b4fb60963c57/tumblr_inline_nep0rpsQ8n1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><span>The KSC has a whole new look in this sneak <a href="http://bit.ly/1xqYINC"><strong>PREVIEW</strong></a> of what’s coming in 0.90!</span></p>
Fun stuff. Happy birthday Max.

Great idea!

I'll repeat what I've been saying long time ago - tech tree should start with unmanned launches. Kerbals sending tiny crappy rockets into suborbital trajectories. Starting with Mk1 just doesn't seem right.
upgradable buildings ?? :/

Suffice to say...

I prefer this space center to the current one...
That was not what I was expecting, but quite funny. I never knew that Kerbals had mobile homes.

upgradable buildings ?? :/

Yes. Yes they are.

It would be a little weird if the space center looked like this now, without the upgrades... Kerbal Zombie Apocalypse Trailer Park, anyone?

The barn is ugly... ...so is the telescope thing... ...

Why don't you design something that look more modern-ish?

And also, the barn seem to link to a launch pad or something. Hope it has something really cool.

Lol, how many stages will the upgradability be in (I imagine 3-5 for start) and will we be able to make our own space center stages ?

Also will I be able to downgrade in sandbox to admire small buildings/destroy a building and then build old version instead of direct repairing ?

YES!

But can we please get some propellers up in here?

Yes. Yes they are.

It would be a little weird if the space center looked like this now, without the upgrades... Kerbal Zombie Apocalypse Trailer Park, anyone?

one thing missing, a farm with cows to send into space :3

oh sorry i meant kows
Ok I gotta say the mobile homes and sandbag barriers are pretty darn funny. Love this look for an early pre-upgrade KSC.
i thought this was a new easter egg at first sight(as in just seeing the image in the OP, not after looking at Imgur) but now i just have to say, I CAN NOT BE MORE EXCITED FOR THIS UPDATE!!!!!
More than ever I want Kerbin to have cities and towns scattered across the globe. There's a lot of supporting civilization that needs to be in place for dilapidated camping trailers to be so common.

WHa....woah....speechless....hahaha! A trailer park for R&D? I love it! Those buildings are amazing too.

The barn is ugly... ...so is the telescope thing... ...

Why don't you design something that look more modern-ish?

And also, the barn seem to link to a launch pad or something. Hope it has something really cool.

Yeah, I really think the barn should look less like a barn and more like the VAB at Kennedy Space Center.

I hope you're kidding...
How do you go from 0.25 to 0.90 so fast? At the rate we increase our versions (like 0.24 to 0.25) we won't see 0.9 for like 10 years aha

I wonder what's inside that barn. Will there be Kerbals drifting around in rusty trucks and tractors?

Edited November 8, 2014 by Rthsom
SUGGESTION: Place a sewer next to the admin building.
Made me smile

Looking good, SQUAD!

How's the art team doing? Have they been fed this week?

I opened a thread about the new space center 2 minutes prior to this one opening. Pro skills.
This. I like this. Storing rocket fuel in grain silos, wind turbines, and is that a nuclear reactor in a tiny shed?

Please tell me we'll be able to use the different tiers of buildings in sandbox. If we can choose to use this space center in sandbox instead of the current one I will be the happiest kerbal in the universe.

This. I like this. Storing rocket fuel in grain silos, wind turbines, and is that a nuclear reactor in a tiny shed?

If that's the R&D complex, I think that's the early model observatory (modern R&D has an impressive - if ornamental - observatory dome in it, as I recall).

I like this - from such humble beginnings the Kerbals strive for the stars. Feels like KSK's "First Flight" fanfic given form

If that's the R&D complex, I think that's the early model observatory (modern R&D has an impressive - if ornamental - observatory dome in it, as I recall).

I like this - from such humble beginnings the Kerbals strive for the stars. Feels like KSK's "First Flight" fanfic given form

Could be. Or it could be the earily version of the tracking center? As that would help spot roids and such much sooner.

Edit: I do mean the observatory dome too.
